title: Request to Waive Late Payment Fee
description: A long-time customer with a good payment history requests to have a late payment fee waived.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific late fee on their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and the fee in question.

tasks.description: Review the customer's account tenure and payment history for the last 24 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has been with the company for 5+ years and has no other late payments in the last 2 years.

tasks.description: Based on the positive history, waive the late fee as a one-time courtesy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies a credit to the account equivalent to the late fee.
